quote_dd: A healthy desire for wealth is not greed. It’s a desire for life. – Jen Sincero
Greed is a bottomless pit which exhausts the person in an endless effort to satisfy the need without ever reaching satisfaction. – Erich Fromm
There is no calamity greater than lavish desires. There is no greater guilt than discontentment. And there is no greater disaster than greed. – Lao-tzu
He who is greedy is always in want. – Horace
It is greed to do all the talking but not to want to listen at all. – Democritus
There is a very fine line between loving life and being greedy for it. – Maya Angelou
Leadership is a privilege to better the lives of others. It is not an opportunity to satisfy personal greed. – Mwai Kibaki
He who is not contented with what he has, would not be contented with what he would like to have. – Socrates
You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need. – Vernon Howard
We’re all born brave, trusting and greedy, and most of us remain greedy. – Mignon McLaughlin
You say, ‘If I had a little more, I should be very satisfied.’ You make a mistake. If you are not content with what you have, you would not be satisfied if it were doubled. – Charles Spurgeon
Greed is a fat demon with a small mouth and whatever you feed it is never enough. – Janwillem van de Wetering
Greed is the assumption that it is all for my consumption. – Andy Stanley
The point is that you can’t be too greedy. – Donald Trump
Greed is the inventor of injustice as well as the current enforcer. – Julian Casablancas
Greed is the lack of confidence of one’s own ability to create. – Vanna Bonta
Selfish persons are incapable of loving others, but they are not capable of loving themselves either. – Erich Fromm
There is nothing wrong with being well off as long as money has a social and ethical value and is not the object of one’s own greed. – Aga Khan IV
Happy the man who has learned the cause of things and has put under his feet all fear, inexorable fate, and the noisy strife of the hell of greed. – Virgil
If your desires be endless, your cares and fears will be so too. – Thomas Fuller
There is a sufficiency in the world for man’s need but not for man’s greed. – Mahatma Gandhi
We shall have to practice to lead our life on the basis of our needs, not under the influence of our greed. – Lobsang Tenzin
Greed is so destructive. It destroys everything. – Eartha Kitt
It didn’t occur to me until later that there´s another truth, very simple: greed in a good cause is still greed. – Stephen King
Greed has taken the whole universe, and nobody is worried about their soul. – Little Richard
